title: FPS drops?
body: I used to average 60 ping and now I'm getting anywhere between 5-30. It drops in teamfights to maybe around 5-20. I hadn't noticed it before the last update. When I tried to update last time, it took 3 times logging in before it even registered that there was an update to be had.

replies.body:
There could be a few different reasons for the FPS issues you're experiencing. For the most part, display drivers or windows power settings are the most common things to affect your FPS. Our [**framerate troubleshooting guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) may be the best course of action right now, as it will take you through the most common solutions for this issue.

If you continue to experience these issues after taking those steps, let me know.
